Images.Caption_en: Toni in water in sking gear.
Man starting to fall into water.

Text_en:
The expedition group trained how to act on weak ice. Pasi from the expedition support team had brought a tent with heating unit. Each member of the expedition group went to water with their special dry suit, without the suit, with and without skies. The dry suit has been designed together with Sasta and they worked as expected. The water without the dry suit is around this time of year just as cold as you can imagine.

Afternoon was spent at Mikko's appartment. Meeting agenda contained last gear decisions.
